name: East Neuk Fisheries
description:
In early development for WeeklyGameJam '93, Theme:  Fishing.

Take to the open sea off from the picturesque East Neuk of Fife and try to make a living.

Controls:

W:  Move forwards

A/D:  Rotate Left/Right

Space:  Fish

Notes:

You can sell your fish from, resupply the boat as well and carry out upgrades at the boathouse.

Some places are better to fish than others.  Fish prefer the quieter waters away from the harbour mouth so can be found in higher densities if you're willing to travel to do so.
